comments: This course is a very interesting exploration of current events, but be sure to do a lot of the reading on your own time. There isn't a ton of structure to the course, so you'll have to do a lot of it yourself.
One of the best classes I took at Harvard if not the best.  Don't know if it will be the same next year with a new teacher but it is awesome to take classes at other schools.
Fantastic course, very relevant and very interesting. Learned a lot through student presentations - overall great course!
It was really interesting and fun to interact with some of the big personalities in this class.
Be prepared to do work/readings on your own to keep up as there is not much hand-holding. Class discussion is very interesting.
Definitely consider taking this course if you are interested in European politics or economics (or both!); Mistral is an amazing professor.
